verbs.description: The yield [V: has] been rallying amid worries President Donald Trump 's tariffs are going to spark inflation .

[ARG1: The yield] has been [V: rallying] [ARGM-LOC: amid worries President Donald Trump 's tariffs are going to spark inflation] .
The yield has been rallying amid worries President Donald Trump 's tariffs [V: are] going to spark inflation .
The yield has been rallying amid worries President Donald Trump 's tariffs are [V: going] to spark inflation .
The yield has been rallying amid worries [ARG0: President Donald Trump 's tariffs] are going to [V: spark] [ARG1: inflation] .
